Notes.Text:
This update for pacemaker fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-16877: Fixed an issue with insufficient local IPC client-server authentication on the client's side (bsc#1131356).
- CVE-2018-16878: Fixed a denial of service related to insufficient verification of uncontrolled processes (bsc#1131353).

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in the way pacemaker's client-server authentication was implemented in versions up to and including 2.0.0. A local attacker could use this flaw, and combine it with other IPC weaknesses, to achieve local privilege escalation.
